Text: Sorry about the slow download, my bandwidth is kind of limited.  :-(

Hello Everyone
I got that download but can't figure out how to do a DVD bootable disk for Genius 2.2. I have leopard 10.5.8.Do it work for that and can someone explin me the steps please?

worked great, booted from dvd and defraged my main partition and finally was able to repartition with boot camp!  thanks!

lavato: just open disk utility, click burn, and point to the .dmg file.  that's it!
the dvd kernel panic'ed both times I tried to boot from it.. i gave up after that. this happened on a late 2009 macbook pro 13", btw.
You gotta upgrade to 2.3 to get it to work fully with Snow Leopard. Can you do that from the 2.2 install?
